Joining us means joining a truly global community of more than 38 900 people dedicated to solving real-world mobility challenges and achieving international projects with sustainable local impact.PURPOSE OF THE JOBResponsible to deliver N&T Backbone Transmission Network (BTN) specifications and Design consistent with the System Delivery Plan
Contributor to support N&T Backbone Transmission Network (BTN) deployment activities (Installation, Test & Commissioning)What are my responsibilities?Elaborate N&T Backbone Transmission Network (BTN) Design specifications (Preliminary Design & Detailed Design) in line with N&T Engineering rules and relying on best practices inherited from previous projects (cross reviews with installation teams, cybersecurity teams, power experts…)
Ensure that all N&T BTN Design elaboration follows Quality processes, including application of Adapt and Design N&T Processes, Methods and Guidelines . Promote the Alstom Code of Ethics and adhering to the highest standards of ethical conduct.

Develop and elicit BTN Design requirements in line with project needs (internal & external), with a specific focus on BTN dimensioning and Cybersecurity concerns. Check that external interfaces are consistent with N&T sub-system
Contribute to project addressing plan elaboration with Project System teams. Participate to the support of the functional validation phase of the sub-system Test platform for BTN part
Elaborate N&T BTN BoQ as a support to PrIDM, including Design elaboration of BTN cubicles and Prepare & Execute technical room (Switching Equipment’s Rooms) surveys
Prepare and participate in Design Reviews and Manage technical issues identified on BTN part. Maintain close follow-up on technical gaps implementation (BTN related) and Open and follow technical Change Requests to Product Engineering teams in charge of N&T products and solutions
Participate upon request and guide Site Installation,T&C activities in order to validate E2E performance, including support to troubleshooting tasks
Provide iteration of the Provide iteration of the BTN and Radio configuration files all along project life cycle till end of warranty period and installation studies specific to N&T sub-system for BTN part
Remain in constant contact with Project N&T Design Leader all along the project life cycle regarding progress of BTN Design activities and Prepare and execute DCS BTN Training.
